name: Unwind, Obstacle, Rewind.
description:
Check Out my Game Dev YT: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpSUXHUavkfJoSdCypa7VHQ?view_as=subscriber

In this 2D Physics-based platform game you play as a roll of cassette tape as you Run, Jump, Swing, and solve your way through an obstacle course as fast as you can.  The goal:  rewind your tape. And of course, the entire thing takes place inside a VCR Cassette :D

WARNING: BIT OF A RAGE GAME

KEEP IN MIND: CD's will disappear after a few seconds!!!!!!!!

I only finished the Windows Version in the time frame of the Jam. Here is an external link to the other versions, which were exported after the time frame but with absolutely zero modifications. These versions are identical and will not be changed.

MAC & LINUX: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zsnDaHc9wBHG5r-OX7ZpcAhkUXYNMc3P?usp=sha...
